awd_titl_txt: Macromolecular Instrumentation for Cell and Molecular       Biology
awd_abstract_narration: This award provides funds to establish a core facility for                      macromolecular synthesis and analysis at the College of Medicine                                                                                                of the Pennsylvania State University.  The facility will foster                 and facilitate interaction and collaboration among cell and                     molecular Biology that stresses rigorous research training for                  graduate students, and  train  postdoctoral fellows in a                        research environment that stresses the use of cell and molecular                                                                                                biology techniques.  The instrumentation will be used for                       research that involves all phases of cell and molecular biology--                                                                                               membrane structure, receptors and modulators, cytoskeleton,                     organelle cell culture.  The investigators are engaged in high-                 quality research and are productive.

perf_inst.perf_inst_name: Pennsylvania State University Milton S Hershey Medical Center
